verses.verse: Concerning the divisions <WH4256> of the porters <WH7778>: Of the Korhites <WH7145> was Meshelemiah <WH4920> the son <WH1121> of Kore <WH6981>, of the sons <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Meshelemiah <WH4920> were, Zechariah <WH2148> the firstborn <WH1060>, Jediael <WH3043> the second <WH8145>, Zebadiah <WH2069> the third <WH7992>, Jathniel <WH3496> the fourth <WH7243>,
Elam <WH5867> the fifth <WH2549>, Jehohanan <WH3076> the sixth <WH8345>, Elioenai <WH454> the seventh <WH7637>.

Moreover the sons <WH1121> of Obed-edom <WH5654> were, Shemaiah <WH8098> the firstborn <WH1060>, Jehozabad <WH3075> the second <WH8145>, Joah <WH3098> the third <WH7992>, and Sacar <WH7940> the fourth <WH7243>, and Nethaneel <WH5417> the fifth <WH2549>,
Ammiel <WH5988> the sixth <WH8345>, Issachar <WH3485> the seventh <WH7637>, Peulthai <WH6469> the eighth <WH8066>: for God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> him.

Also unto Shemaiah <WH8098> his son <WH1121> were sons <WH1121> born <WH3205>, that ruled <WH4474> throughout the house <WH1004> of their father <WH1>: for they were mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>.

The sons <WH1121> of Shemaiah <WH8098>; Othni <WH6273>, and Rephael <WH7501>, and Obed <WH5744>, Elzabad <WH443>, whose brethren <WH251> were strong <WH2428> men <WH1121>, Elihu <WH453>, and Semachiah <WH5565>.

All these of the sons <WH1121> of Obed-edom <WH5654>: they and their sons <WH1121> and their brethren <WH251>, able <WH2428> men <WH376> for strength <WH3581> for the service <WH5656>, were threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> of Obed-edom <WH5654>.
And Meshelemiah <WH4920> had sons <WH1121> and brethren <WH251>, strong <WH2428> men <WH1121>, eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240>.

Also Hosah <WH2621>, of the children <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, had sons <WH1121>; Simri <WH8113> the chief <WH7218>, (for though he was not the firstborn <WH1060>, yet his father <WH1> made <WH7760> him the chief <WH7218>;)

Hilkiah <WH2518> the second <WH8145>, Tebaliah <WH2882> the third <WH7992>, Zechariah <WH2148> the fourth <WH7243>: all the sons <WH1121> and brethren <WH251> of Hosah <WH2621> were thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240>.

Among these were the divisions <WH4256> of the porters <WH7778>, even among the chief <WH7218> men <WH1397>, having wards <WH4931> one against <WH5980> another <WH251>, to minister <WH8334> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>.
¶ And they cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486>, as well the small <WH6996> as the great <WH1419>, according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, for every gate <WH8179>.

And the lot <WH1486> eastward <WH4217> fell <WH5307> to Shelemiah <WH8018>. Then for Zechariah <WH2148> his son <WH1121>, a wise <WH7922> counseller <WH3289>, they cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486>; and his lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> northward <WH6828>.
To Obed-edom <WH5654> southward <WH5045>; and to his sons <WH1121> the house <WH1004> of Asuppim <WH624>.

To Shuppim <WH8206> and Hosah <WH2621> the lot came forth westward <WH4628>, with the gate <WH8179> Shallecheth <WH7996>, by the causeway <WH4546> of the going up <WH5927>, ward <WH4929> against <WH5980> ward <WH4929>.

Eastward <WH4217> were six <WH8337> Levites <WH3881>, northward <WH6828> four <WH702> a day <WH3117>, southward <WH5045> four <WH702> a day <WH3117>, and toward Asuppim <WH624> two <WH8147> and two <WH8147>.
At Parbar <WH6503> westward <WH4628>, four <WH702> at the causeway <WH4546>, and two <WH8147> at Parbar <WH6503>.
These are the divisions <WH4256> of the porters <WH7778> among the sons <WH1121> of Kore <WH7145>, and among the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>.
¶ And of the Levites <WH3881>, Ahijah <WH281> was over the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>, and over the treasures <WH214> of the dedicated things <WH6944>.

As concerning the sons <WH1121> of Laadan <WH3936>; the sons <WH1121> of the Gershonite <WH1649> Laadan <WH3936>, chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1>, even of Laadan <WH3936> the Gershonite <WH1649>, were Jehieli <WH3172>.
The sons <WH1121> of Jehieli <WH3172>; Zetham <WH2241>, and Joel <WH3100> his brother <WH251>, which were over the treasures <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>.
Of the Amramites <WH6020>, and the Izharites <WH3325>, the Hebronites <WH2276>, and the Uzzielites <WH5817>:
And Shebuel <WH7619> the son <WH1121> of Gershom <WH1647>, the son <WH1121> of Moses <WH4872>, was ruler <WH5057> of the treasures <WH214>.

And his brethren <WH251> by Eliezer <WH461>; Rehabiah <WH7345> his son <WH1121>, and Jeshaiah <WH3470> his son <WH1121>, and Joram <WH3141> his son <WH1121>, and Zichri <WH2147> his son <WH1121>, and Shelomith <WH8019> <WH8013> his son <WH1121>.

Which Shelomith <WH8013> and his brethren <WH251> were over all the treasures <WH214> of the dedicated things <WH6944>, which David <WH1732> the king <WH4428>, and the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1>, the captains <WH8269> over thousands <WH505> and hundreds <WH3967>, and the captains <WH8269> of the host <WH6635>, had dedicated <WH6942>.
Out of the spoils <WH7998> won in battles <WH4421> did they dedicate <WH6942> to maintain <WH2388> the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>.

And all that Samuel <WH8050> the seer <WH7200>, and Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027>, and Abner <WH74> the son <WH1121> of Ner <WH5369>, and Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870>, had dedicated <WH6942>; and whosoever had dedicated <WH6942> any thing, it was under the hand <WH3027> of Shelomith <WH8019>, and of his brethren <WH251>.
¶ Of the Izharites <WH3325>, Chenaniah <WH3663> and his sons <WH1121> were for the outward <WH2435> business <WH4399> over Israel <WH3478>, for officers <WH7860> and judges <WH8199>.

And of the Hebronites <WH2276>, Hashabiah <WH2811> and his brethren <WH251>, men <WH1121> of valour <WH2428>, a thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967>, were officers <WH6486> among them of Israel <WH3478> on this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> westward <WH4628> in all the business <WH4399> of the LORD <WH3068>, and in the service <WH5656> of the king <WH4428>.

Among the Hebronites <WH2276> was Jerijah <WH3404> the chief <WH7218>, even among the Hebronites <WH2276>, according to the generations <WH8435> of his fathers <WH1>. In the fortieth <WH705> year <WH8141> of the reign <WH4438> of David <WH1732> they were sought <WH1875> for, and there were found <WH4672> among them mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428> at Jazer <WH3270> of Gilead <WH1568>.

And his brethren <WH251>, men <WH1121> of valour <WH2428>, were two thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1>, whom king <WH4428> David <WH1732> made rulers <WH6485> over the Reubenites <WH7206>, the Gadites <WH1425>, and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4520>, for every matter <WH1697> pertaining to God <WH430>, and affairs <WH1697> of the king <WH4428>.
